original_text: And because he was of the same craft, he abode with them, and wrought: for by their occupation they were tentmakers.
korean_text: 생업이 같으므로 함께 살며 일을 하니 그 생업은 천막을 만드는 것이더라

sentences.original_text: And because he was of the same craft
for by their occupation they were tentmakers
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 직업으로 그들은 천막을 만드는 사람이었기 때문이다
